Record Cash App Payment (Admin)

This page lets an admin record a manual Cash App payment into the server using /admin/record-cashapp. You must supply admin auth (Authorization: Bearer <ADMIN_TOKEN>).


    
  




  
  Admin Reconcile
  


  
Reconcile payments

  
Provide admin token as `?admin_token=...` (for testing). This UI loads payments and pending applications and allows assigning an application to a payment.

    Admin Reconcile - Reflection Form
    
  
  
    
Admin Reconcile

    
Upload CSV (export from Sheets) or paste JSON array of responses. Mark rows as paid and download the reconciliation CSV.


    

      
      
      
      
    


    


    
  







  

  

  Admin — Reconcile Payments

  





  


    
Admin — Reconcile Payments


    
Import form responses (CSV from Google Sheets or JSON), mark rows as paid, add transaction id/amount, and save reconciliation.
